# 灵魂的礼物

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/linghunde-liwu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/linghunde-liwu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install linghunde-liwu
linghunde-liwu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g linghunde-liwu
linghunde-liwu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
